1.title: A Rising Tide
1.plot: Yonderland's inhabitants look forward to a future without Imperatrix, and a shadowy figure returns to the Elders' Chamber. In the real world, Debbie is shocked when Peter is offered a new job in Glasgow.

2.title: Elders' 11
2.plot: Cuddly Dick takes advantage of the Chosen One's departure to stir up rebellion among the people of Yonderland, forcing the Elders into exile.

3.title: The Bird and the Bee
3.plot: Cuddly Dick tightens his grip on Yonderland by taking control of the press. Debbie tries to restore the Yonderlanders' faith in her, but a new hero has emerged in her absence.

4.title: Boo
4.plot: Debbie struggles to balance restoring her public image in Yonderland with holding the twins' birthday party at home. Negatus struggles to settle in to his new home in prison. And a war has broken out over baked goods.

5.title: The Negatus Redemption
5.plot: Debbie attempts to free Negatus from jail and comes face to face with some of Yonderland's most bizarre and lawless characters, the Sister Brothers. Peter's dad questions if Peter and Debbie's planned move to Glasgow is a good idea.

6.title: Swapsies
6.plot: After Debbie frees Negatus he embarks on a mission to infiltrate Cuddly Dick's chamber and spy on behalf of the Elders. On their way to Yonderland, Elf and Debbie swap bodies after something goes drastically wrong with Nick's portal.

7.title: Miss Smashing
7.plot: Negatus is getting close to discovering the fate of the people of Yonderland, but his loyalties are becoming blurred as Cuddly Dick draws him closer. Debbie discovers that contestants of a reality TV competition are disappearing.

8.title: The Time Being
8.plot: Cuddly Dick attempts to maintain control of the local population in every devious way imaginable. Negatus leads Debbie to where the missing people of Yonderland are held. But little does she know, Cuddly Dick is waiting for her.

9.title: It's The Thought That Counts
9.plot: The people on both sides of the portal celebrate the holiday season. Debbie learns about the Yonderland holiday of "Thanktival" and the elders and their children sing to save the realm. Negatus hatches a plan to steal everyone's presents.

1.title: The Chosen Mum
1.plot: Married mum-of-two Debbie Maddox finds herself transported into a fantasy world.

2.title: Wizard Bradley
2.plot: Debbie sets off to find the missing scroll, but needs the help of a wayward wizard who has lost his Mojo.

3.title: Reformation
3.plot: Debbie learns that, sometimes, honesty isn't the best policy when she and Elf bump into the Monks of Old John.

4.title: The Ultimate Prize
4.plot: Excitement bubbles as the residents of Yonderland prepare for Ye Grand Tournament, the equivalent of the Olympics for the realm's knights.

5.title: Closing the Portal
5.plot: Debbie has had enough of the quests and wants her life back, to concentrate on her family, not being The Chosen One.

6.title: The Idiot King
6.plot: Debbie and Negatus meet face-to-face for the first time while camping in the forest.

7.title: The Heart of the Sun
7.plot: Used to expecting the unexpected in Yonderland, Debbie is captured and taken to Ninny village.

8.title: Dirty Ernie
8.plot: Negatus travels through the portal to Debbie's home under the guise of Dirty Ernie.

1.title: Panic on the Streets of Yonderland
1.plot: Imperatrix's presence brings rioting to the streets on Yonderland and sends the Elders into lockdown.

2.title: The Winging Detective
2.plot: A murder at the Meadowlands Festival calls for the (not-so-genius) mind of Yonderland's finest (or, rather, only) detective.

3.title: A Vicious Circle
3.plot: Ellis of Woolworth mistakenly believes that Debbie is to blame for his brother's fate.

4.title: Up the Workers
4.plot: Debbie discovers a sweatshop run by newly-educated Ninnies. Plus, a message from Yonderland reveals alarming information about Debbie's past.

5.title: Nanny Le Roo
5.plot: When she refuses to be banished from Yonderland, Debbie is reunited with her eccentric childhood nanny after she and Elf pay a visit to her former home.

6.title: Game of Crones
6.plot: Debbie heads into the Imperatrix-controlled Darklands to rescue a top scientist who has been hoodwinked into making a weapon of mass destruction.

7.title: The Last Fahl
7.plot: Debbie is called to Yonderland when the Elders hear news that a vicious monster is placing the last survivor of a noble species at risk.

8.title: Careful What You Wish For
8.plot: The discovery of a wish granting tree causes chaos in Yonderland. At the same time, Imperatrix launches her deadly secret weapon.

imdb.plot outline: 33-year-old Debbie Maddox (Martha Howe-Douglas) is becoming increasingly bored with life as a suburban stay-at-home mum. Then one day an elf (voice of Mathew Baynton) appears from a portal in her cupboard insisting that she's the 'Chosen One' destined to save Yonderland, a magical land threatened by the evil Negatus (Simon Farnaby). Reluctantly, Debbie agrees to meet with the Elders of the realm... only to discover that they've lost the scroll that explains what the Chosen One is actually supposed to do. Yonderland, it turns out, is a very silly place indeed, and it will take all Debbie's resources to complete each week's quest in time to pick up the children from school.
imdb.title: Yonderland
plot: In a far away land hidden in her cupboard Debbie must fulfill her duties as the chosen one and save Yonder Land.::lizshorrock

33-year-old Debbie Maddox (Martha Howe-Douglas) is becoming increasingly bored with life as a suburban stay-at-home mum. Then one day an elf (voice of Mathew Baynton) appears from a portal in her cupboard insisting that she's the 'Chosen One' destined to save _Yonderland_ (qv), a magical land threatened by the evil Negatus (Simon Farnaby). Reluctantly, Debbie agrees to meet with the Elders of the realm... only to discover that they've lost the scroll that explains what the Chosen One is actually supposed to do. _Yonderland_ (qv), it turns out, is a very silly place indeed, and it will take all Debbie's resources to complete each week's quest in time to pick up the children from school.
synopsis: An average Mom suddenly discovers there is an entire world in the back of her kitchen larder. Taken beyond the portal by a helpful elf, and a grumpy talking stick, she is soon to discover that she is the chosen one who's coming was written, and only she can save the people of Yonderland.Two of Yonderland's characters meet as one is entering, and the other is leaving through the same door, only neither of the two will allow the other to be more courteous than he, and just as they are about to come to blows over the indignity that they each feel at having been out shined by the other the chosen one steps in out of frustration, and orders that the two of them stop fighting, and shake hands, and get over it. That day would be known as the first time in history that someone of Yonderland did not die in battle. The war was over, and all thanks to the chosen one. This new hand graspy shaking thing would replace the fighting from now on.It's parts of Princess Bride, Labyrinth, Dark Crystal, Discworld and Fraglerock + just a little "The Sarah Jane Adventures" rolled into a nice bit of humour for all ages.*The storyline of Series 1-3, told in chronological order:Nestor of Maddox, a nobleman from the Twelve Realms, accidentally gains access to the forbidden Second Scroll that foretells the Realms' future. He is horrified to read in it that his twin daughters, one good and one evil, are destined to unite and cause unimaginable destruction. Nestor steals the scroll, kidnaps his good daughter Debbie from her wet nurse Nanny La Roo, transports himself to Earth, and leaves Debbie in the care of a public welfare agency in Birmingham, England. In this way Nestor hopes that fate will be averted and Debbie will never meet her sister.The evil daughter grows up to be Imperatrix, the ruthless warlord who conquers eleven of the Twelve Realms and is intent on subjugating the last remaining free Realm, Yonderland. An enterprising elf discovers Debbie living in Selly Oak, Birmingham, with her twin children and husband Peter, and persuades her to come with him through a convenient space-time portal in her kitchen pantry to Yonderland, where she is hailed as the Chosen One, destined to save Yonderland and usher in a new age of peace. Debbie soon finds herself on a hectic schedule shuttling back and forth between Selly Oak, where she tries to carry on her roles as wife and mother as normally as possible, and Yonderland, where she embarks on a quest to find the Second Scroll that will explain to her why she is the Chosen One. Along the way, with the help of Elf and his magic stick Nick, Debbie becomes a valued and beloved pillar of the community, offering sensible leadership and advice while dodging the attempts of Imperatrix's buffoonish sub-overlord Negatus and his demonic minions to stop her.On his deathbed, realizing that his attempts to shield Debbie from her fate have failed, Nestor sends her a box containing the Second Scroll--which one of Negatus' minions steals--and a message warning her to avoid Imperatrix. But after Imperatrix sends a giant robot to destroy Yonderland, Negatus persuades Debbie to confront Imperatrix and save the Realm. Debbie succeeds and Imperatrix disarms the robot, killing herself in the process.Peter is promoted to a new job in Glasgow, and Debbie reluctantly prepares to sell their house and lose access to her kitchen cupboard portal to Yonderland. However, a new threat to the Twelve Realms emerges: Cuddly Dick, a valued associate of the Council of Elders, whose brain has been taken over by an parasitical despot bent on conquering the Realms. The possessed Dick uses his personal warmth to seize control of the Realms, taking command of Imperatrix's crew of evil Overlords and turning the people of Yonderland against Debbie, Elf and the Elders. With Negatus as an unreliable ally, Debbie endeavors to stop Dick and win back the hearts and minds of the people of Yonderland. After a series of perilous adventures she succeeds: the parasite is removed from Dick's head, making him good again and ending his evil reign. Back on Earth, Peter realizes that neither he nor his family really wants to leave their home in Selly Oak and turns down the job in Glasgow.
